name: Codekitties/green forked from mitrikyle/green
tagline: Help the average person get more involved in environmental issues!
body:
# green
Help the average person get more involved in environmental issues. This website uses the Esri API to give people important information about environmental issues near them. It also allows them to report issues, create events and join their community members to take action. It also has websites to help people be environmentally aware. 
Note: This repository was forked from mitrikyle/green. [Click here](https://github.com/mitrikyle/green) to view the original.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
